sense.def: Pathological Condition of painful lower back and knees. Possibly Alternative Writing of feng jue 風厥 , wind and recession. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry hai tong pi 海桐皮：古方多用浸酒治風蹶 , “Steeped in wine often used in ancient recipes to cure wind fall ”. Feng kuang 風狂 , wind madness [9]

Pathological Condition of psychic derangement manifesting itself as senseless movements and irregular outbursts of joy and anger. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 2: 皆由血氣虛 , 受風邪，致令陰陽氣 相併所致，故名風狂 , “Whenever wind evil is received in a situation of blood and qi depletion, this causes yin and yang qi to unite. Hence this is called wind madness ”.
